main event: A sighting of a bright oval-shaped object moving rapidly in the sky was reported on September 5, 1957.
interesting points: The object shone like a reflection from a mirror., The sighting initially suggested it might be an aircraft in trouble, but its speed and flight mechanics dismissed this idea., Observations indicate a horizontal movement after a slight climb., The report was forwarded to the Air Defense Command for further investigation., No photographs were taken during the sighting.
witness description: the witness reported seeing a metallic disc-like object with glowing lights on its underside.
